nodes.text: A museum was a place for collecting and displaying objects of permanent value. The dense city that sprawled the surface of Coruscant had many museums, including the Museum of Multispecies Sciences. The smuggler Hedge Mitchels once found a crystal artifact, which he planned on donating to a museum. Jude Edivon, an academically skilled cadet at the Royal Imperial Academy on Coruscant, enjoyed visiting museums, while her roommate Kendy Idele found that activity tedious.
